imports: import type { Resource } from "@s4tk/models/types"; // TypeScript only

header.description: Base for all resources to implement.

content.name: compressionType
content.description: How this resource is or should be compressed when written in a package. For all non-raw resources, this should always be ZLIB.

content.name: isCompressed
content.description: True if this resource is permanently compressed in the format specified by 'compressionType'. Note that this property is true for uncompressed data if 'compressionType === CompressionType.Uncompressed'. This can only be true for raw resources; parsed resources are not responsible for their own compression.

content.name: sizeDecompressed
content.description: (Only for resources that are permanently compressed; i.e. their 'isCompressed' property is true) The size of this resource in bytes when it is decompressed.

content.name: isXml
content.description: True if this resource contains XML, false otherwise. Note that this is still false for binary resources that can be converted to XML, such as SimData.
